
Gateway API Tutorial
********************

class isensit_gw.ISensitGW

   Handle gateway configuration.

   get_aws_credentials()

      Return SECRET KEY and ACCESS KEY for AWS :rtype: object

   get_gateway_id()

      Return the gateway id :return: gateway id :rtype: int

   get_gateway_name()

      Return the current gateway name. :return: gateway id :rtype:
      string

   get_get_url()

      Return the GET url of AWS. :return: aws url :rtype: str

   get_mysql_credentials()

      Return MySQL credentials, host, username and password :return:
      Host, Username, Password :rtype: object

   get_mysql_sleeptime()

      Return Sleeptime for BLE reading :return: sleeptime :rtype: int

   get_post_url()

      Return the AWS POST URL. :return: POST url :rtype: string

   get_software_version()

      Retrun the Software Version :return: software version :rtype:
      string

   init_json_config_data()

      Initialise class via the json config file. :return: True if
      config file was found, Flase if not found. :rtype: Boolean

   set_software_version(version)

      Set Gateway Software Version :param version: new version to set
      :type version: string

   static update_config_file(item, value)

      Update Config File :param item: Key for the config file :type
      item: String :param value: Value for the Key :type value: String
      :return: success status :rtype: string
